basics.name: Mohammad K. Hussain
basics.label: Software Developer with expertise in web technologies.
basics.summary: Passionate about building innovative solutions and contributing to open source projects. Experienced in full-stack development with a focus on modern web technologies.

work.name: PT. Gunung Amal Solution International
work.summary: Worked on a freelance basis for back-end development, including system and API development for an Audit Trail Management System project. Collaborated with Business Analysts to meet project-specific requirements.
responsibilities: Developed back-end systems and APIs for Audit Trail Management System.
Collaborated with Business Analysts to understand project requirements.
Designed system architecture and participated in code reviews.

work.name: PT. Khatulistiwa Nusantara Indonesia (KHANSIA)
work.summary: Assisted senior developers in building and maintaining back-end systems for mobile applications, gaining hands-on experience with back-end technologies.
responsibilities: Assisted in building and maintaining back-end systems for mobile applications.
Participated in Agile development processes including sprint planning and daily stand-ups.
Integrated back-end functionalities with front-end user interfaces.

education.summary: Focusing on software development and web technologies. Coursework includes Data Structures, Algorithms, Web Development, and Database Systems.
Completed with distinction, participated in various tech competitions and coding clubs.

projects.name: Portfolio Website
projects.description: Personal portfolio website built with modern web technologies
highlights: Implemented responsive design with modern UI/UX principles
Optimized performance with lazy loading and code splitting

projects.name: Task Manager
highlights: Built RESTful API with authentication and authorization

projects.name: Weather App
projects.description: Weather forecast application with location-based services
highlights: Integrated with multiple weather APIs for accurate forecasts
Implemented geolocation services for automatic location detection

projects.name: E-commerce Platform
projects.description: Online shopping platform with product management
highlights: Implemented secure payment processing with Stripe
Built admin dashboard for inventory and order management

projects.name: Chat Application
highlights: Built user authentication and friend management system

projects.name: Recipe Finder

highlights: Integrated with food recipe APIs for extensive recipe database
